text: The 2016 Big East Conference men's soccer season was the four season for the newly realigned Big East Conference. Including the history of the original Big East Conference, this was the 21st season of men's soccer under the "Big East Conference" name. The Georgetown Hoyas are both the defending regular season and conference tournament champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadiums and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align: left;" !
